info.name: Firefox: better checkbox
info.description: Replace the Firefox original checkmark/radio mark with a cute icon for easier check out. An alternative precisely compatible with Menu-Metro style is here: Firefox: better checkbox compatible4Menu-Metro
info.additionalInfo:
Thanks skofkyo for brilliant thought on https://g.mozest.com/viewthread.php?tid=41859&page=4#pid288368

All of your donation will goes to community of Mozest.com &/Firefox.net.cn to help Mozilla users in 中文, thank you!

It will be announced publicly here for transparency every end of month.
https://groups.google.com/d/forum/mdnzh

您所有的捐款将惠及Mozest.com和/或Firefox.net.cn社区，以帮助更多的中文Mozilla用户，谢谢！

所有可能得到的捐款将在此按月宣布，以供查询！
https://groups.google.com/d/forum/mdnzh
